title: Confession
description: Mary Roberts Rinehart is claimed to have invented the "Had I but known" mystery genre.  When Agnes Blakiston rented the old parsonage at Miss Emily's request she soon came to regret it.  Was the house haunted?  Did Miss Emily have a secret so terrible she would rather die than reveal it?  To find the answers you will need to listen. (Summary by Annise)

sections.title: 02 - 'It may be said, and with truth.....'
03 - 'I had the very slightest acquaintance with the basement...'
04 - 'For several days things remained in statu quo.'
